basics.name: Nicolás Aldao
basics.label: React Native | React Developer
basics.summary: I have an Associate's Degree in Systems Analysis. I worked in an Argentine IT consulting company for 5 years as part of different projects. Currently I work on freelance projects for clients abroad. My experience in formal employment taught me to be familiar with the processes and standards managed by large companies, and my experience in freelance, taught me to be able to adapt to dynamic environments, working autonomously, offering the necessary availability for the client's product to be successful.

work.name: React Native Developer
work.position: Upwork, Freelance | Refers app project (USA) and fitness app project (Argentina)
work.summary: Bug fixing and new features development in mobile applications. Optimization and refactoring of legacy code. APK generation, testing on iOS and Android. Configuration and implementation of various React Native libraries. Styling with TailwindCSS. State management with Redux Toolkit.

work.name: React Developer
work.summary: Fix bugs and new features development in mobile application. Create responsive UI. Deploys with Jenkins. Refactor and optimize old code.
